context_bundle.summary: Git MCP Server - 20 tools for complete git workflow: status, log, diff, branch, commit, stash, push/pull, blame. Wraps git.exe via Process with path parameter for multi-repo ops.

onboarding.quick_start: git_status path:C:\Dev\MyRepo | git_log count:10 oneline:true | git_commit message:'fix bug' all:true | git_push
common_patterns: git_stash action:push -> git_checkout target:main -> git_stash action:pop
known_errors: dubious ownership - run git config --global --add safe.directory '*'
not a git repository - check path points to repo root
